elements.title: lang::report_4_coursesenrollmentstatus::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT 
    u.id AS u_id,
    u.firstname,
    u.lastname,
    u.email,
    u.city,
    u.country,
    c.id       AS c_id,
    c.fullname AS c_fullname,
    cm.id      AS cm_cmid,
    m.name AS module_name,
    ROUND(
        CASE
            WHEN g.rawgrademax > 0 THEN (g.finalgrade / g.rawgrademax) * 100
            ELSE g.finalgrade
        END, 0
    ) AS grade,
    CASE
        WHEN cmc.completionstate = 0 THEN 'lang::report_4_completionstate_0::local_kopere_bi'
        WHEN cmc.completionstate = 1 THEN 'lang::report_4_completionstate_1::local_kopere_bi'
        WHEN cmc.completionstate = 2 THEN 'lang::report_4_completionstate_2::local_kopere_bi'
        WHEN cmc.completionstate = 3 THEN 'lang::report_4_completionstate_3::local_kopere_bi'
        WHEN cmc.completionstate = 4 THEN 'lang::report_4_completionstate_4::local_kopere_bi'
        ELSE 'lang::report_4_completionstate_none::local_kopere_bi'
    END AS completionstate_status,
    CASE
        WHEN cm.completion = 0 THEN 'lang::report_4_completion_0::local_kopere_bi'
        WHEN cm.completion = 1 THEN 'lang::report_4_completion_1::local_kopere_bi'
        WHEN cm.completion = 2 THEN 'lang::report_4_completion_2::local_kopere_bi'
        ELSE 'lang::report_4_completion_none::local_kopere_bi'
    END AS completion_status,
    ue.enrol_status AS enrol_status,
    ue.timeend       AS enrol_timeend
FROM (
    SELECT MIN(ue1.id) AS id, 
           ue1.userid, 
           e1.courseid, 
           MIN(ue1.status) AS enrol_status, 
           MIN(ue1.timeend) AS timeend
    FROM mdl_user_enrolments ue1
    JOIN mdl_enrol e1 ON e1.id = ue1.enrolid
    GROUP BY ue1.userid, e1.courseid
) ue
JOIN mdl_user u 
         ON u.id = ue.userid
JOIN mdl_course c 
         ON c.id = ue.courseid
JOIN mdl_course_modules cm 
         ON cm.course = c.id
        AND cm.instance > 0
JOIN mdl_modules m 
         ON m.id = cm.module
LEFT JOIN mdl_grade_items gi 
         ON gi.itemtype = 'mod'
        AND gi.iteminstance = cm.instance
        AND gi.itemmodule = m.name
        AND gi.gradetype = 1
LEFT JOIN mdl_grade_grades g 
         ON g.itemid = gi.id
        AND g.userid = u.id
LEFT JOIN mdl_course_modules_completion cmc 
         ON cmc.coursemoduleid = cm.id
        AND cmc.userid = u.id
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i.itemid, 
           GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.rawname) AS tags
     FROM mdl_tag_instance i
     JOIN mdl_tag t ON t.id = i.tagid
    WHERE i.itemtype = 'course_modules'
    GROUP BY i.itemid
) ta ON ta.itemid = cm.id
WHERE c.id = :courseid
  AND u.deleted = 0
  AND u.suspended = 0
  AND c.visible = 1
  AND cm.visible = 1

elements.title: lang::report_4_enrolpercourse::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT c.fullname,
       SUM(CASE 
               WHEN ue.status = 0 AND (ue.timeend = 0 OR ue.timeend > UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) THEN 1
               ELSE 0
           END) AS 'lang::active_enrolments::local_kopere_bi',
       SUM(CASE 
               WHEN ue.status = 1 THEN 1
               ELSE 0
           END) AS 'lang::inactive_enrolments::local_kopere_bi',
       SUM(CASE 
               WHEN ue.status = 0 AND ue.timeend > 0 AND ue.timeend < UNIX_TIMESTAMP() THEN 1
               ELSE 0
           END) AS 'lang::expired_enrolments::local_kopere_bi'
FROM mdl_course c
JOIN mdl_enrol e ON e.courseid = c.id
JOIN mdl_user_enrolments ue ON ue.enrolid = e.id
GROUP BY c.id
ORDER BY c.fullname
